Search.Name: Objects like Port, Parts and give there type

RootTable.Filter:
SELECT t1.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, t1.Object_Type AS CLASSTYPE, t1.Name AS Object, t1.Object_Type AS [Type],t1.Stereotype As Stereotype, t2.Name As [:TypeName], t2.Object_Type As [:Type], t2.Stereotype As [:Stereotype]
FROM t_object t1, t_object t2
where t2.ea_guid = t1.pdata1 and t1.name like '<Search Term>'
order by 3
select t.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID,t.Diagram_Type As CLASSTYPE, t.Name AS Object, t.Diagram_Type,t.Author,t.modifiedDate from t_diagram as t order by 3,2

SELECT DISTINCT dia.ea_guid as CLASSGUID, dia.Diagram_Type as CLASSTYPE, pkg.Name As 'Package Signal', o.name As Signal, o.stereotype As 'Stereotype', dia.Name as Diagramm, s.name As 'Source Class', s.stereotype As stereotype, d.name As 'Klasse 2', c.name As 'Connector Name', link.diagramID, Instance_ID As DiagramLink, link.ConnectorId FROM t_object o, t_xref x, t_connector c, t_object s, t_object d, t_diagramlinks link, t_diagram dia, t_package pkg where x.client = c.ea_guid and d.object_Type = 'Class' and d.stereotype in ('TCMS', 'TRAIN') and s.object_Type = 'Class' and s.stereotype in ('TCMS', 'TRAIN') and o.object_Type = 'Class' and c.start_object_id = s.object_id and c.end_object_id = d.object_id and link.ConnectorID = c.Connector_Id and link.DiagramID = dia.Diagram_ID and c.connector_type ='InformationFlow' and link.hidden = 0 and x.Behavior = 'conveyed'
and exists (select * from t_diagramobjects y where (c.start_object_id = y.Object_Id) and Diagram_ID = dia.Diagram_Id) and exists (select * from t_diagramobjects y where (c.end_object_id = y.Object_Id) and Diagram_ID = dia.Diagram_Id)
and o.Package_Id = pkg.Package_Id and pkg.name like '<Search Term>' and o.ea_guid in ( #DB=SQLSVR# substring(x.description,0,39), substring(x.description,39,39), substring(x.description,78,39), substring(x.description,117,39), substring(x.description,156,39), substring(x.description,195,39), substring(x.description,234,39), substring(x.description,273,39), substring(x.description,312,39), substring(x.description,351,39) #DB=SQLSVR# #DB=Other# left(x.description,38), mid(x.description,40,38), mid(x.description,79,38), mid(x.description,118,38), mid(x.description,157,38), mid(x.description,196,38), mid(x.description,235,38), mid(x.description,274,38), mid(x.description,313,38), mid(x.description,352,38) #DB=Other# ) order by 3,5,7

SELECT o.ea_guid As CLASSGUID, o.Object_Type As CLASSType, o.Name, o.object_id, p.Property, Min(p.Value) AS [MinValue], Max(p.Value,) AS [MaxValue], Count(p.PropertyId) AS [Count of values], Min(ISNULL(p.Value)) As [Min], Max(ISNULL(p.Value)) As [Max] FROM t_object AS o INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS p ON o.Object_ID=p.Object_ID WHERE (((o.stereotype)='System requirement')) GROUP BY o.ea_guid, o.Object_Type, o.Name, p.Property, o.object_id HAVING (((Count(p.propertyId))=2)) ORDER BY 3, 5;

SELECT o.ea_guid As CLASSGUID, o.Object_Type As CLASSType, o.Name, o.object_id, p.Property, Min(p.Value) AS [MinValue], Max(p.Value,) AS [MaxValue], Count(p.PropertyId) AS [Count of values], Min(ISNULL(p.Value)) As [Min], Max(ISNULL(p.Value)) As [Max] FROM t_object AS o INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS p ON o.Object_ID=p.Object_ID WHERE o.stereotype='System requirement' GROUP BY o.ea_guid, o.Object_Type, o.Name, p.Property, o.object_id HAVING Count(p.propertyId)=2 AND Min(ISNULL(p.Value)) = 0 AND Min(ISNULL(p.Value)) = -1
ORDER BY 3, 5;

SELECT o.ea_guid As CLASSGUID, o.Object_Type As CLASSType, o.Name, o.object_id, p.Property, Min(p.Value) AS [MinValue], Max(p.Value,) AS [MaxValue], Count(p.PropertyId) AS [Count of values], Min(ISNULL(p.Value)) As [Min], Max(ISNULL(p.Value)) As [Max] FROM t_object AS o INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS p ON o.Object_ID=p.Object_ID WHERE o.stereotype='System requirement' GROUP BY o.ea_guid, o.Object_Type, o.Name, p.Property, o.object_id HAVING Count(p.propertyId)=2 AND Min(ISNULL(p.Value)) = -1 AND Max(ISNULL(p.Value)) = -1
ORDER BY 3, 5;

SELECT o.ea_guid As CLASSGUID, o.Object_Type As CLASSType, o.Name, o.object_id, p.Property, p.Value, p.propertyID FROM t_object AS o INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS p ON o.Object_ID=p.Object_ID WHERE o.stereotype='System requirement'
ORDER BY 3, 5;

SELECT o.ea_guid As CLASSGUID, o.Object_Type As CLASSType, o.Name, o.object_id, p.Property, Min(p.Value) AS [MinValue], Max(p.Value,) AS [MaxValue], Count(p.PropertyId) AS [Count of values], Min(ISNULL(p.Value)) As [Min], Max(ISNULL(p.Value)) As [Max] FROM t_object AS o INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS p ON o.Object_ID=p.Object_ID WHERE (((o.stereotype)='System requirement')) GROUP BY o.ea_guid, o.Object_Type, o.Name, p.Property, o.object_id HAVING (((Count(p.propertyId))=1)) ORDER BY 3, 5;

CREATE FUNCTION SplitToTable (@list ntext, @delimiter nchar(1) = N',') RETURNS @tbl TABLE (listpos int IDENTITY(1, 1) NOT NULL, str varchar(4000), nstr nvarchar(2000)) AS
BEGIN DECLARE @pos int, @textpos int, @chunklen smallint, @tmpstr nvarchar(4000), @leftover nvarchar(4000), @tmpval nvarchar(4000)
SET @textpos = 1 SET @leftover = '' WHILE @textpos <= datalength(@list) / 2 BEGIN SET @chunklen = 4000 - datalength(@leftover) / 2 SET @tmpstr = @leftover + substring(@list, @textpos, @chunklen) SET @textpos = @textpos + @chunklen
SET @pos = charindex(@delimiter, @tmpstr)
WHILE @pos > 0 BEGIN SET @tmpval = ltrim(rtrim(left(@tmpstr, @pos - 1))) INSERT @tbl (str, nstr) VALUES(@tmpval, @tmpval) SET @tmpstr = substring(@tmpstr, @pos + 1, len(@tmpstr)) SET @pos = charindex(@delimiter, @tmpstr) END
SET @leftover = @tmpstr END
INSERT @tbl(str, nstr) VALUES (ltrim(rtrim(@leftover)), ltrim(rtrim(@leftover))) RETURN END

select Max(d.ea_guid) AS CLASSGUID,Max(d.Diagram_Type) As CLASSTYPE, d.Name, count(o.Name) AS Diagramelemente from t_diagram d, t_diagramobjects do, t_object o where d.diagram_id = do.Diagram_id and do.object_id = o.Object_ID and d.Diagram_type in ('Logical' ) and o.object_Type = 'Class' Group by d.name
order by 3,2

select Max(d.ea_guid) AS CLASSGUID,Max(d.Diagram_Type) As CLASSTYPE, left(d.Name,6), count(o.Name) AS Diagramelemente from t_diagram d, t_diagramobjects do, t_object o where d.diagram_id = do.Diagram_id and do.object_id = o.Object_ID and d.Diagram_type in ('Logical' ) and o.object_Type = 'Class' Group by left(d.Name,6)
order by 3,2
select * from t_diagramlinks
select ea_guid AS CLASSGUID,object_Type As CLASSTYPE, name from t_object where object_Type = 'Requirement' AND Stereotype in ('System Requirement') order by 3
select * from t_object where name like 'A#WC#'

select Max(r.ea_GUID) As CLASSGUID, r.Name, Min(r.stereotype) As StereotypeMin, Max(r.Stereotype) As StereotypeMax, count(r.Name) As CountOfRequirements from t_object r where r.object_Type = 'Requirement' Group by r.name
Having Count(Name) > 1
Order By Name

select ea_guid AS CLASSGUID,object_Type As CLASSTYPE, name, stereotype from t_object where object_Type = 'Requirement' AND Stereotype in ('System Requirement', 'SW Requirement', 'Input Requirement') order by 3

select o.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, o.object_type AS CLASSTYPE, o.name As RTF ,pkg1.name As Package from t_object o, t_package pkg, t_package pkg1 where o.Stereotype = 'model document' AND o.Package_Id = pkg.Package_Id AND pkg.Parent_ID = pkg1.Package_Id AND pkg1.Name LIKE '<Search Term>#WC#' order by 4

select max(o.ea_guid) AS CLASSGUID, max(object_Type) AS CLASSTYPE, o.name, Max(o.object_Type) As Type, o.stereotype, min(o.multiplicity) As MultMin, max(o.multiplicity) As MultMax, count(o.object_id) As Count from t_object o where o.name like '<Search Term>#WC#' AND o.object_Type <> 'Package' and o.name not in ('Ende','Start','Initial') and o.stereotype not in ('model document') group by o.name, o.stereotype Having count(o.Name) > 1 order by count(o.diagram_id) desc, name

select o.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, object_Type AS CLASSTYPE, o.name, o.stereotype, o.object_type, o.author, o.aliAS, multiplicity, o.note from t_object o where o.name like '<Search Term>#WC#' order by name
select t.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID,t.Diagram_Type AS CLASSTYPE, t.Name AS Object, t.Diagram_Type,t.Author,t.modifiedDate from t_diagram AS t where name like '<Search Term>#WC#' order by 3,2

select s.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, s.object_type AS CLASSTYPE, s.name AS Source, s.object_type AS SourceType, t.name AS Target, t.object_type AS TargetType, c.connector_type from t_connector c, t_object s, t_object t where c.start_object_id = s.object_id and c.end_object_id = t.object_id and c.connector_type Not in ('Generalization', 'Nesting', 'Dependency') AND c.connector_type in ('InformationFlow') AND not exists ( select * from t_diagramlinks link where link.connectorid = c.connector_id) order by s.name, c.connector_type

select o.ea_guid As CLASSGUID, o.object_type As CLASSTYPE , o.name AS ObjectName, o.object_Type As ObjectType, o.stereotype As StereoType from t_object o inner JOIN t_attribute a On a.object_id = o.object_id where NOT exists (select * from t_attribute where o.ElementGUID = <Search Term> )

select d.ea_guid As CLASSGUID, d.diagram_type As CLASSTYPE, d.name As Diagram, d.diagram_type As Type, d.Author,d.modifiedDate As Modified, d.notes As [Notes] from t_diagram d where d.Package_id in (#Branch#) AND d.name like '<Search Term>#WC#' order by 3

select ea_guid As CLASSGUID, Object_type As CLASSTYPE, name , Object_type As Type, Stereotype, Author, modifiedDate As Modified, note As [Notes] from t_object e where Package_id in (#Branch#) AND name like '<Search Term>#WC#' AND Object_Type NOT IN ('Package', 'Text') order by 3

SELECT DISTINCT s.ea_guid as CLASSGUID, s.Object_Type as CLASSTYPE, 'Source' As [Direction], pkg.Name As Package, dia.Name as Diagramm, s1.name As 'Class 1', s.name As 'Port 1',o.name As Signal, d1.name As 'Class 2', d.name As 'Port 2', c.connector_type As 'Connector Type', link.Hidden, c.name As 'Connector Name', c.stereotype As 'Connector Stereotype' FROM t_object o, t_xref x, t_connector c, t_object s, t_object d, t_object s1, t_object d1, t_diagramlinks link, t_diagram dia, t_package pkg where o.ea_guid= '<Search Term>' and x.description like '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#' and s.parentid = s1.object_ID and d.parentid = d1.object_ID
and c.ea_guid = x.client and c.start_object_id = s.object_id and c.end_object_id = d.object_id and link.ConnectorID = c.Connector_Id and link.DiagramID = dia.Diagram_ID and pkg.Package_Id = dia.Package_Id and x.Behavior = 'conveyed'
and exists (select * from t_diagramobjects y where (c.start_object_id = y.Object_Id) and Diagram_ID = dia.Diagram_Id) and exists (select * from t_diagramobjects y where (c.end_object_id = y.Object_Id) and Diagram_ID = dia.Diagram_Id)
UNION SELECT DISTINCT d.ea_guid , d.Object_Type , 'Target', pkg.Name As Package, dia.Name as Diagramm, s1.name , s.name ,o.name As Signal, d1.name , d.name , c.connector_type , link.Hidden, c.name , c.stereotype FROM t_object o, t_xref x, t_connector c, t_object s, t_object s1, t_object d, t_object d1, t_diagramlinks link, t_diagram dia, t_package pkg where o.ea_guid= '<Search Term>' and x.description like '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#' and s.parentid = s1.object_ID and d.parentid = d1.object_ID
and c.ea_guid = x.client and c.start_object_id = s.object_id and c.end_object_id = d.object_id and link.ConnectorID = c.Connector_Id and link.DiagramID = dia.Diagram_ID and pkg.Package_Id = dia.Package_Id and x.Behavior = 'conveyed'
and exists (select * from t_diagramobjects y where (c.start_object_id = y.Object_Id) and Diagram_ID = dia.Diagram_Id) and exists (select * from t_diagramobjects y where (c.end_object_id = y.Object_Id) and Diagram_ID = dia.Diagram_Id)
order by 5,6,7,3

SELECT DISTINCT o.ea_guid as CLASSGUID, o.Object_Type as CLASSTYPE, o.name As Item, o.Object_Type As ItemType, o.stereotype As 'ItemStereotype', "Connector" As ConnectorType, c.Name, c.Stereotype
FROM t_object o, t_xref xCon, t_xref xFlow, t_connector c, t_connector flow where c.connector_ID = <Search Term> and c.ea_guid = xCon.Client and xCon.Behavior = 'abstraction' and flow.ea_guid in ( #DB=SQLSVR# substring(x.description,0,39), substring(xCon.description,39,39), substring(xCon.description,78,39), substring(xCon.description,117,39), substring(xCon.description,156,39), substring(xCon.description,195,39), substring(xCon.description,234,39), substring(xCon.description,273,39), substring(xCon.description,312,39), substring(xCon.description,351,39) #DB=SQLSVR# #DB=ORACLE# substring(x.description,0,39), substring(xCon.description,39,39), substring(xCon.description,78,39), substring(xCon.description,117,39), substring(xCon.description,156,39), substring(xCon.description,195,39), substring(xCon.description,234,39), substring(xCon.description,273,39), substring(xCon.description,312,39), substring(xCon.description,351,39) #DB=ORACLE# #DB=Other# left(xCon.description,38), mid(xCon.description,40,38), mid(xCon.description,79,38), mid(xCon.description,118,38), mid(xCon.description,157,38), mid(xCon.description,196,38), mid(xCon.description,235,38), mid(xCon.description,274,38), mid(xCon.description,313,38), mid(xCon.description,352,38) #DB=Other# ) AND flow.ea_guid = xFlow.client AND o.ea_guid in ( #DB=SQLSVR# substring(xFlow.description,0,39), substring(xFlow.description,39,39), substring(xFlow.description,78,39), substring(xFlow.description,117,39), substring(xFlow.description,156,39), substring(xFlow.description,195,39), substring(xFlow.description,234,39), substring(xFlow.description,273,39), substring(xFlow.description,312,39), substring(xFlow.description,351,39) #DB=SQLSVR# #DB=ORACLE# substring(x.description,0,39), substring(xCon.description,39,39), substring(xCon.description,78,39), substring(xCon.description,117,39), substring(xCon.description,156,39), substring(xCon.description,195,39), substring(xCon.description,234,39), substring(xCon.description,273,39), substring(xCon.description,312,39), substring(xCon.description,351,39) #DB=ORACLE# #DB=Other# left(xFlow.description,38), mid(xFlow.description,40,38), mid(xFlow.description,79,38), mid(xFlow.description,118,38), mid(xFlow.description,157,38), mid(xFlow.description,196,38), mid(xFlow.description,235,38), mid(xFlow.description,274,38), mid(xFlow.description,313,38), mid(xFlow.description,352,38) #DB=Other# ) UNION SELECT DISTINCT o.ea_guid , o.Object_Type , o.name, o.Object_Type, o.stereotype, "Information Flow", c.Name, c.Stereotype
FROM t_object o, t_xref x, t_connector c where x.client = c.ea_guid and x.Behavior = 'conveyed' and c.connector_ID = <Search Term> and o.ea_guid in ( #DB=SQLSVR# substring(x.description,0,39), substring(x.description,39,39), substring(x.description,78,39), substring(x.description,117,39), substring(x.description,156,39), substring(x.description,195,39), substring(x.description,234,39), substring(x.description,273,39), substring(x.description,312,39), substring(x.description,351,39) #DB=SQLSVR# #DB=ORACLE# substring(x.description,0,39), substring(xCon.description,39,39), substring(xCon.description,78,39), substring(xCon.description,117,39), substring(xCon.description,156,39), substring(xCon.description,195,39), substring(xCon.description,234,39), substring(xCon.description,273,39), substring(xCon.description,312,39), substring(xCon.description,351,39) #DB=ORACLE# #DB=Other# left(x.description,38), mid(x.description,40,38), mid(x.description,79,38), mid(x.description,118,38), mid(x.description,157,38), mid(x.description,196,38), mid(x.description,235,38), mid(x.description,274,38), mid(x.description,313,38), mid(x.description,352,38) #DB=Other# )
order by 3,4,5

select c.ea_GUID As CLASSGUID, c.Connector_type AS CLASSTYPE, o.name, o.object_id, o.ea_guid, op.name, c.name from t_connector c, t_object o,t_operation op where c.End_Object_ID = o.Object_ID AND o.Object_id = op.object_id AND Instr(1,c.name,op.name) AND Instr(1,c.name,')')
UNION select c.ea_GUID, c.Connector_type, o.name, o.object_id, o.ea_guid, op.name, c.name from t_connector c, t_object o, t_object o1, t_operation op where c.End_Object_ID = o.Object_ID AND o1.Object_id = op.object_id AND o1.classifier = o.Object_ID AND Instr(1,c.name,op.name) AND Instr(1,c.name,')')

select c.ea_GUID, c.Connector_type, o.name, o1.name, o.object_id,o.object_id, o.ea_guid, op.name, c.name,Mid(op.name,1,Instr(1,c.name,'(')), Instr(1,c.name,'p1') from t_connector c, t_object o, t_object o1, t_operation op where c.End_Object_ID = o.Object_ID AND o1.classifier = o.Object_ID AND o.Object_id = op.object_id
select * from t_object

select c.ea_guid As CLASSGUID, c.connector_type AS CLASSTYPE, c.name, c.connector_id, c.start_object_id, c.end_object_id, op.name from t_connector c,t_object o, t_operation op where c.end_object_id = o.object_id AND o.object_id = op.object_id AND Mid(c.name,1,Instr(c.name,'(')-1 ) = op.name
UNION select c.ea_guid As CLASSGUID, c.connector_type AS CLASSTYPE, c.name, c.connector_id, c.start_object_id, c.end_object_id, op.name from t_connector c, t_object o1, t_object o, t_operation op where c.end_object_id = o1.object_id AND o1.classifier = o.object_id AND o.object_id = op.object_id AND Mid(c.name,1,Instr(c.name,'(')-1 ) = op.name

select o.ea_guid As CLASSGUID, o.Object_Type AS CLASSTYPE, 'Diagram' , d.name As DiagramName, o.Object_Type, o.Name, pkg.name As PkgName, o.Author, #DB=JET# o.Note #DB=JET# #DB=ORACLE# Cast(o.Note As Varchar2(50)) #DB=ORACLE# As Notes ,NType,o.CREATEDDATE, o.ModifiedDate, o.ea_guid, o.package_id
from t_object o, t_diagramobjects do, t_diagram d, t_package pkg where o.NType = 1001 AND o.Object_Type = 'Boundary' AND o.object_id = do.object_id AND d.diagram_ID = do.diagram_id AND o.package_id = pkg.package_id
UNION select o.ea_guid , o.Object_Type, 'Object', o.name , o.Object_Type, o.Name, pkg.name,o.Author, #DB=JET# o.Note #DB=JET# #DB=ORACLE# Cast(o.Note As varchar2(50)) #DB=ORACLE# ,NType,o.CREATEDDATE, o.ModifiedDate, o.ea_guid,o.package_ID
from t_object o, t_package pkg where o.NType = 1001 AND o.Object_Type = 'Boundary' AND o.package_id = pkg.package_id Order by 3,1

select o.ea_guid As CLASSGUID, o.Object_type As CLASSTYPE, 'Behaviour / Classifier' As Usage, o.name As Name, o.Object_Type As Type, o.stereotype As Stereotype from t_operation op, t_object o where op.EA_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND #DB=JET# op.Behaviour = o.EA_GUID #DB=JET# #DB=ORACLE# Cast(op.Behaviour As Varchar2(38)) = o.EA_GUID #DB=ORACLE#
#DB=SQLSVR# /* --------------------------------------------------------Find State Operation from Class operation (do,entry,exit) -----------------------------------*/ #DB=SQLSVR#
UNION select op.ea_guid , 'Operation' , 'Operation of Class or State', op.name , Type, op.stereotype from t_operation op where #DB=JET# op.Behaviour = '<Search Term>' #DB=JET# #DB=ORACLE# Cast(op.Behaviour As Varchar2(38)) = '<Search Term>' #DB=ORACLE#
#DB=SQLSVR# /* --------------------------------------------------------Find Class Operation from State operation (do,entry,exit) -----------------------------------*/ #DB=SQLSVR# UNION select op.ea_guid , 'Operation' , 'Operation Class<--> State', op.name , op.Type, op.stereotype from t_operation opState, t_operation op where #DB=JET# opState.ea_guid = '<Search Term>' AND #DB=JET# #DB=JET# opState.Behaviour = op.ea_guid #DB=JET# #DB=ORACLE# Cast(opState.Behaviour as Varchar2(38)) = '<Search term>' AND #DB=ORACLE# #DB=ORACLE# Cast(opState.Behaviour As Varchar2(38)) = op.ea_guid #DB=ORACLE#
#DB=SQLSVR# /* --------------------------------------------------------Find Call Action -----------------------------------*/ #DB=SQLSVR#
UNION select o.ea_guid , o.Object_Type , 'Call Action', o.name , o.Object_Type, o.stereotype from t_operation op, t_object o where o.Classifier_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND o.Classifier_GUID = op.ea_GUID
#DB=SQLSVR# /* --------------------------------------------------------Find Call from Action of type Call Operation -----------------------------------*/ #DB=SQLSVR#
UNION select op.ea_guid , 'Operation' , 'Call Operation', op.name , 'Operation', op.stereotype from t_operation op, t_object o where o.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND o.Classifier_GUID = op.ea_GUID
#DB=SQLSVR# /* --------------------------------------------------------Find Activity from Action of type Call Behavior -----------------------------------*/ #DB=SQLSVR#
UNION select o.ea_guid , o.Object_Type , 'Behavior', o.name , o.Object_Type, o.stereotype from t_object o, t_object o1 where o1.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND o1.Classifier_GUID = o.ea_GUID
#DB=SQLSVR# /* --------------------------------------------------------Find Instances from Classifier -----------------------------------*/ #DB=SQLSVR#
UNION select o.ea_guid , o.Object_Type , 'Object', o.name , o.Object_Type, o.stereotype from t_object o, t_object o1 where o1.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND o.Classifier_GUID = o1.ea_GUID
#DB=SQLSVR# /* --------------------------------------------------------Find return type of method-----------------------------------*/ #DB=SQLSVR#
UNION select o.ea_guid , o.Object_Type , 'ReturnType', o.name , o.Object_Type, o.stereotype from t_operation op, t_object o , t_object o1 where op.EA_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND #DB=JET# Format(o.Object_ID) = op.Classifier AND #DB=JET# #DB=ORACLE# Cast(o.Object_ID As Varchar2(38)) = op.Classifier AND #DB=ORACLE# op.object_id = o1.object_id
#DB=SQLSVR# //================== Operation Parameter ==============================================#DB=SQLSVR# UNION select op.ea_guid , 'Operation', #DB=JET# 'ParameterType ' & opp.Name & ':' & opp.Type, #DB=JET# #DB=ORACLE# Concat(opp.Name,':'), #DB=ORACLE# o.name , o.Object_Type, o.stereotype
from t_operation op, t_object o, t_object o1, t_operationparams opp where o.EA_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND #DB=JET# Format(o.Object_ID) = opp.Classifier AND #DB=JET# #DB=ORACLE# Cast(o.Object_ID As Varchar2(38)) = opp.Classifier AND #DB=ORACLE# op.OperationID = opp.OperationID AND op.object_id = o1.object_id
#DB=SQLSVR# //================== Operation used in Sequence Diagram ==============================================#DB=SQLSVR# UNION select o.ea_guid , o.Object_type, 'Sequence Message', o.name, o.Object_Type, o.stereotype
from t_connectortag conTag, t_connector con, t_object o where conTag.Value = '<Search Term>' AND conTag.ElementID = con.Connector_ID AND con.End_Object_ID = o.Object_ID
#DB=SQLSVR# //================== Attribute and its type ==============================================#DB=SQLSVR# UNION select o.ea_guid , o.Object_Type, 'Attrubute Type', o.name, o.Object_Type, o.stereotype
from t_attribute a, t_object o where a.ea_guid = '<Search Term>' AND #DB=JET# Format(o.Object_ID) = a.Classifier #DB=JET# #DB=ORACLE# Cast(o.Object_ID As Varchar2(38)) = a.Classifier #DB=ORACLE#
#DB=SQLSVR# //================== Classifier used in Attribute ==============================================#DB=SQLSVR# UNION select a.ea_guid ,'Attribute', 'Attrubute Type', a.name, 'Attribute', o.stereotype
from t_attribute a, t_object o where o.ea_guid = '<Search Term>' AND #DB=JET# Format(o.Object_ID) = a.Classifier #DB=JET# #DB=ORACLE# Cast(o.Object_ID As Number) = a.Classifier #DB=ORACLE#
#DB=SQLSVR# //================== Part / Object of class ==============================================#DB=SQLSVR# UNION select o.ea_guid ,o.Object_type, 'Part', #DB=JET# o.name + ':' + o1.name, #DB=JET# #DB=ORACLE# Concat( ':' , o1.name), #DB=ORACLE# o.object_type, o.stereotype
from t_object o, t_object o1 where o1.ea_guid = o.PDATA1 AND o.PDATA1 = '<Search Term>'
#DB=SQLSVR# //================== Class of Part ==============================================#DB=SQLSVR# UNION select o.ea_guid ,o.Object_type, 'Part', #DB=JET# o.name + ':' + o1.name, #DB=JET# #DB=ORACLE# Concat( ':' , o1.name), #DB=ORACLE# o.object_type, o.stereotype
from t_object o, t_object o1 where o1.ea_guid = '<Search Term>' AND o1.PDATA1 = o.ea_guid
#DB=SQLSVR# //================== Usage in Diagram ==============================================#DB=SQLSVR# UNION select d.ea_guid, d.Diagram_Type, 'Diagram', d.name,d.Diagram_Type,d.stereotype from t_diagram d, t_diagramobjects do, t_object o where d.diagram_ID = do.diagram_ID AND do.Object_ID = o.Object_ID AND o.ea_guid = '<Search Term>' UNION #DB=ORACLE# /* Trigger for Action */ #DB=ORACLE# select o.ea_guid , o.Object_type , 'Trigger for Action', o.name , o.Object_Type , o.stereotype from #DB=JET# (t_xref x INNER JOIN t_object o on (Mid(x.description,1,38) = o.ea_guid or Mid(x.description,40,38) = o.ea_guid)) #DB=JET# #DB=ORACLE# (t_xref x INNER JOIN t_object o on (to_char(Substr(Description,1,38)) = o.ea_guid or to_char(Substr(Description,40,38)) = o.ea_guid) ) #DB=ORACLE# INNER JOIN t_object o1 on (x.client = o1.ea_guid) where x.behavior = 'trigger' AND o1.ea_guid = '<Search Term>'
UNION #DB=ORACLE# /* Action for Trigger */ #DB=ORACLE# select o1.ea_guid , o1.Object_type , 'Action for Trigger' , o1.name , o1.Object_Type , o1.stereotype from #DB=JET# (t_xref x INNER JOIN t_object o on (Mid(x.description,1,38) = o.ea_guid or Mid(x.description,40,38) = o.ea_guid)) #DB=JET# #DB=ORACLE# (t_xref x INNER JOIN t_object o on (to_char(Substr(Description,1,38)) = o.ea_guid or to_char(Substr(Description,40,38)) = o.ea_guid) ) #DB=ORACLE# INNER JOIN t_object o1 on (x.client = o1.ea_guid) where x.behavior = 'trigger' AND o.ea_guid = '<Search Term>' UNION #DB=ORACLE# /* Signal for Trigger */ #DB=ORACLE# select sig.ea_guid , sig.Object_type , 'Signal for Trigger' , sig.name , sig.Object_Type , sig.stereotype from #DB=JET# t_xref x INNER JOIN t_object sig on (Mid(x.description,9,38) = sig.ea_guid) #DB=JET# #DB=ORACLE# t_xref x INNER JOIN t_object sig on (to_char(Substr(Description,9,38)) = sig.ea_guid) #DB=ORACLE# where x.client = '<Search Term>' AND Behavior = 'event' UNION #DB=ORACLE# /* Signal for Trigger */ #DB=ORACLE# select trig.ea_guid , trig.Object_type , 'Trigger for Signal' , trig.name , trig.Object_Type , trig.stereotype from t_xref x INNER JOIN t_object trig on (x.client = trig.ea_guid ) where #DB=JET# Mid(x.description,9,38) = '<Search Term>' #DB=JET# #DB=ORACLE# to_char(Substr(Description,9,38)) = '<Search Term>' #DB=ORACLE# AND Behavior = 'event' UNION #DB=ORACLE# /* Hyperlink auf Diagram */ #DB=ORACLE# Select lnk.ea_guid , lnk.Object_type , 'Hyperlink to Diagram' , lnk.name , lnk.Object_Type , lnk.stereotype from t_object lnk LEFT JOIN t_diagram dia on #DB=JET# ( lnk.pdata1 = Format(dia.diagram_ID ) ) #DB=JET# #DB=ORACLE# ( lnk.pdata1 = Cast(dia.diagram_ID As Varchar2(20))) #DB=ORACLE# Where dia.ea_guid = '<Search Term>'
Order By 3,4
#DB=SQLSVR# /* The search finds the following references for a Method with the GUID as a 'Search Term': - Specified by Aktivity - Return type - Parameter Type - Called by Action
*/ #DB=SQLSVR#

SELECT d.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, d.diagram_type AS CLASSTYPE, d.ModifiedDate, #DB=ORACLE# /* Modified diagrams */ #DB=ORACLE# #DB=ORACLE# Trunc(SYSDATE - d.ModifiedDate) As "Days" #DB=ORACLE# #DB=JET# DateDiff("d",d.ModifiedDate,Now()) As "Days" #DB=JET# #DB=SQLSVR# DATEDIFF(day, d.ModifiedDate, getdate()) #DB=SQLSVR#
,d.Name, d.diagram_type As Type, d.Author, u.firstname, u.surname, d.StereoType, d.CreatedDate
FROM t_diagram d left join t_secuser u on u.userlogin = d.author WHERE d.package_id in ( #Branch#) and d.name like '<Search Term>#WC#'
Order By modifiedDate desc

select op.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, 'Operation' AS CLASSTYPE, op.name, 'Operation' As Type, op.stereotype from t_operation op inner join t_object o on ( op.object_id = o.object_id) where op.name like '<Search Term>#WC#' AND o.package_id in (#Branch#)
UNION select o.ea_guid, o.object_type, o.name, o.object_type, o.stereotype from t_object o where o.name like '<Search Term>#WC#' AND o.object_type in ( 'Activity', 'StateMachine','Interaction') AND o.package_id in (#Branch#)
order by 4,3

select o.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, o.object_type AS CLASSTYPE ,name, object_type,'' As Type from t_object o inner join t_objectproperties p on (o.object_ID=p.object_id) where object_type in ('Component') AND p.Property = 'isRoot' UNION select o.ea_guid as CLASSGUID, o.object_type as CLASSTYPE ,name, object_type,stereotype from t_object o inner join t_objectproperties p on (o.object_ID=p.object_id) where object_type in ('Class') AND p.Property = 'isRoot' order by 4 desc, 5, 3

select o.ea_guid As CLASSGUID, o.Object_Type as CLASSTYPE, o.Name, o.stereotype, o.object_type from t_object o inner join t_xref x on (o.EA_GUID = x.client) where Type = 'Favorite' UNION select d.ea_guid As CLASSGUID, d.Diagram_Type as CLASSTYPE, d.Name, d.stereotype, d.diagram_type from t_diagram d inner join t_xref x on (d.EA_GUID = x.client) where Type = 'Favorite' UNION select a.ea_guid As CLASSGUID, 'Attribute' as CLASSTYPE, a.Name, a.stereotype, 'Attribute' from t_attribute a inner join t_xref x on (a.EA_GUID = x.client) where x.Type = 'Favorite' UNION select o.ea_guid As CLASSGUID, 'Attribute' as CLASSTYPE, o.Name, o.stereotype, 'Operation' from t_operation o inner join t_xref x on (o.EA_GUID = x.client) where x.Type = 'Favorite'
order by 3

select o.ea_guid As CLASSGUID, o.Object_Type as CLASSTYPE, o.Name, o.stereotype, o.object_type from t_object o inner join t_xref x on (o.EA_GUID = x.client) where Type = 'Favorite' UNION select d.ea_guid As CLASSGUID, d.Diagram_Type as CLASSTYPE, d.Name, d.stereotype, d.diagram_type from t_diagram d inner join t_xref x on (d.EA_GUID = x.client) where Type = 'Favorite' UNION select a.ea_guid As CLASSGUID, 'Attribute' as CLASSTYPE, a.Name, a.stereotype, 'Attribute' from t_attribute a inner join t_xref x on (a.EA_GUID = x.client) where x.Type = 'Favorite' UNION select op.ea_guid As CLASSGUID, 'Opperation' as CLASSTYPE, op.Name, op.stereotype, 'Operation' from t_operation op inner join t_xref x on (op.EA_GUID = x.client) where x.Type = 'Favorite' order by 3
